name: Joy
wishText: As I age, my wild heart will live for younger days;)
textInChatBox: I am thankful for a life lived in grace and favour,
text2: I made this to mark a day and ...
text3: commemorate the most important day of my life!
text4: Was chilling, decided to do something
text5Content:
Am,
 Making memories that never Fade!
outroText: You rock! Thanks for the birthday wishes.
replayText: God  bless and click, if you want to watch it again.
